author: Chris Roche
content: In beating the drum for the Cape Horner association http://www.capehorners.org we are currently preparing a list of all single handed non stop rounding`s Jeanne is currently the oldest of the fair sex to have made such a rounding and when she completes this circumnavigation will have extended her record even further she is already the oldest in class, she is a full member of the Cape Horner`s and an example to all no matter what sex they be. We wish her well in her continuing endeavours and at the same time hope she inspires others to such heights of endeavour well done thus far Jeanne.

author: Ginny
content: What a star she is, and may the rest of the sail go well (better!!).
